teacher_info.intro:
Please note I do not teach students under 18 years of age. Thank you.
                       
Hi, I'm Paul and I'm a qualified English teacher from England, now based in the UK.  I love teaching English to adults, which is why I have been doing it full-time for 28 years.  In fact, I am also an avid language learner myself, which explains why I am currently learning German. My other interests include psychology, history, personal development and long-distance running.
teacher_info.about_me:
Please note I do not teach students under 18 years of age. Thank you.
                       
Hi, I'm Paul and I'm a qualified English teacher from England, now based in the UK.  I love teaching English to adults, which is why I have been doing it full-time for 28 years.  In fact, I am also an avid language learner myself, which explains why I am currently learning German. My other interests include psychology, history, personal development and long-distance running.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Around 10 years ago, I switched to one-to-one English tutoring and coaching as I found it more rewarding than classroom teaching.  In this setting, I can identify more clearly individual needs and modify the course accordingly. It's great to see students make more progress as a result.  Outside lesson time, I enjoy preparing materials for my students. At the moment, for instance, I am writing a short story with accompanying audio to help students with their English.
teacher_info.teaching_style: In my lessons I always try to strike a balance between enjoyment on the one hand and solid progress on the other.  In a typical conversation course, for instance, as we have an enjoyable chat based on topics I think you will find interesting, I will make a note of new or forgotten words, expressions and collocations, issues with pronunciation and intonation, as well as any unnatural phrasing or grammar mistake.  After the lesson, I send you these notes and they form the basis of homework exercises and tests if you have requested them.  I may also send you specific grammar exercises and recordings to help you make more progress.

course_info.trial_description: This is an informal chat so we can get to know each other and talk about your English language goals. During the 30 mins, I can also give you a quick overview of my teaching style and the materials I use in order to give you a better idea if I'm the teacher for you.

pro_course_detail.title: General English ( Intermediate to Advanced )
pro_course_detail.description: The aim of this course is to address your English language needs and to teach you in a way that suits you.  At the end of the session, you will always have some notes that include new items of vocabulary, pronunciation points and a section which shows you how to make your English sound more natural.

pro_course_detail.title: Job Interviews
pro_course_detail.description: In these sessions we will go through some of the very typical questions interviewers ask applicants at interview.  The focus is on accurate and clear production of the language. Having taught a number of professionals working in human resources, I can also provide you with some tips as to how to answer those trickier questions such as: ‘What can you bring to the company?’ or ‘Where do you see yourself in five years’ time?’

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Preparation
pro_course_detail.description: In these lessons, the focus is on enhancing your speaking and writing skills. With regard to speaking, in the lessons we will run through some IELTS mock interviews paying particular attention to improving your fluency, lexical range, grammar and pronunciation.  As for writing, I will set one IELTS writing task per 60-minute lesson for homework and correct it outside lesson time.  In the following lesson, we will discuss ways of improving your written work according to the IELTS assessment criteria.

pro_course_detail.title: CAE Preparation
pro_course_detail.description: In these lessons, the focus is on honing your speaking and writing skills. With regard to speaking, in the lessons we will practise doing mock Cambridge C1 interviews, working particularly on enhancing your ability to express complex ideas using a wide range of grammatical structures and vocabulary items.  As for writing, I will set one Cambridge C1 writing task per 60-minute lesson for homework and correct it outside lesson time.  In the following lesson, we will discuss ways of improving your written work according to the Cambridge C1 assessment criteria.

pro_course_detail.title: Romanian for kids (5 min break) 30-45 min
pro_course_detail.description:
1) Romanian pronunciation ( NO PACKAGE / ONLY SINGLE LESSON )
The Romanian alphabet currently contains 31 letters and it uses the 26 characters of the Latin alphabet, plus a series of 5 additional characters formed by the use of diacritical marks.
 Often these 5 letters can not be pronounced by foreigners and if the wrong diacritic is used, the word or meaning of the sentence might be completely different.
 In these lessons, I will help you distinguish different sounds and pronounce them correctly.
I'll use postcards , videos , music and various didactic material who can help you and make the class fun and educational.

2)Romanian for kids ( SINGLE LESSON / PACKAGE )
These classes have been created for children between 5 and 15 years old. The lessons will be fun and educational. I will use textbooks, images, videos, songs, postcards and any educational material that could attract the curiosity and participation of your child.

teacher_info.intro:
Welcome everyone! My name is Sonia. I am a certified English with over three years teaching experience. I was born and raised in Ghana, West Africa, where English is our official language. 

I am an avid language learner and a patient teacher. I am currently learning Spanish, so I have a fair understanding and experience with all the hurdles that comes with learning a language that is not native to you.
I'm also currently teaching myself how to code and hope to be a good programmer in the near future. 

I love watching Tv series and reading novels. My favourite genre is Period drama and Fantasy.

I love trivia games and riddles, so if you have any you can throw them my way.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a teacher, I take a meaning-focused approach with my students. I employ task-based teaching methods in the classroom.

 I will plan well structured lessons to help you develop your proficiency and ability speak to fluently and effortlessly.  We can also have conversations or discussions on any topic of your choice to help you practice.
No topic is off limits!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Depending on the lesson, my students can expect a different format. 

Generally, I intend to prepare my students for the English speaking world in addition to the English language. That means focusing on the style, nuance and pragmatics of the language simultaneously with the technical functions of English.

 I include many interactive activities in my English lessons. I use a range of digital resources and I try to keep class fun. My classes are safe, judgment free spaces where I patiently work with my students to reach their goals.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, my name is Caroline and I am from Cape Town, South Africa. Therefore I am a native ENGLISH speaker. I am a TEFL Certified teacher with more than 15 years of experience.
I currently live in Cape Town, I have been here all my life and I teach English at a private nursery.
I have explored South Africa and lots of areas within our country, but there is so much still to see and I have a wish list to visit other countries later on.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I studied Teaching English as a Foreign Language (TEFL) a few years ago and started teaching about 15 years ago to 2 to 8-year-olds at a private creche.
I also teach private lessons to advanced students to improve their grammar, vocabulary and conversational skills but I have always enjoyed the beginners more and love watching a student gain satisfaction from learning new language skills.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I like using general words, phrases and other things that you see or use on a daily basis, as it is a great way to start, for example, parts of the body, animals, actions, etc. Depending on the level of students a lesson plan will be created to suit their needs. I sometimes give homework to be completed and feedback will be given at the end of each lesson. I will use flashcards, books, and activity sheets and most importantly I will try and make each class fun, enjoyable and relaxing.
For advanced students, I will discuss hobbies and interests that feel comfortable to hold a conversation and advance as we move forward.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am an attentive and patient conversationalist and have been tutoring Grade 12 learners for the past 5 years. I also have TESOL/TEFL certification from the World Tesol Academy. 

As a teacher, I create a healthy environment between myself and my students by allowing them to set their own goals and push them to achieve those goals. I have also coached debate teams and helped them reach national and international level. 

I help learners improve their grammar, fluency, sentence structure and overall confidence in the English language.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I use a mixture of delegation and discussion in my teaching. I allow learners to set their own goal so that we can easily track whether they are improving or not.  This also allows me to know how much information to give at a time so that I do not overload their plate. 

I prefer discussions through current affairs and every day language use so that the learner can use the English that they learn as soon as possible.

teacher_info.intro: My name is Gabriel. I grew up in Mexico City, but in February of 2020 I moved to London. I got my BA with honours in International Relations in Mexico. Then, I lived in Wales in 2011 and 2012 when I got my Masters Degree by Research in Media Culture and Communication, and I also lived for 9 months in Chicago, Illinois, and Columbus, Ohio; so I am fluent in English and Spanish. I enjoy international experiences and diverse cultures, and I have also visited almost 30 countries, maybe even yours. I am improving my French, so I understand what it feels like to learn another language; and now I'm ready and happy to help you learn too.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified 2nd Language Teacher, teaching since 2015. I love helping others, and learning French too
teacher_info.about_me: My name is Gabriel. I grew up in Mexico City, but in February of 2020 I moved to London. I got my BA with honours in International Relations in Mexico. Then, I lived in Wales in 2011 and 2012 when I got my Masters Degree by Research in Media Culture and Communication, and I also lived for 9 months in Chicago, Illinois, and Columbus, Ohio; so I am fluent in English and Spanish. I enjoy international experiences and diverse cultures, and I have also visited almost 30 countries, maybe even yours. I am improving my French, so I understand what it feels like to learn another language; and now I'm ready and happy to help you learn too.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Since 2015 I have taught full time to students from 13 to 65 years of age, from basic academic skills to advanced business levels (for companies like Amazon, LinkedIn, Burger King and Walmart), and to people from all continents; always adapting to their needs. I got my certification as a foreign language teacher from the National Autonomous University of Mexico in 2019. I can switch from English to Spanish or vice versa if needed (but I generally prefer only to speak in the language I teach), and I can also support with different accents, formal expressions or slang. I have helped others presenting international certifications such as the IELTS, TOEFL and USA and Mexico citizenship.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
If my student wants enjoyable lessons with fun activities and a natural technique, I'm ready to help. I see myself more as a guide than a teacher because the most important thing for me is that my students improve by learning to learn. Generally, in the first lessons, I identify the learning needs of my students, and later we work with suitable activities. 
We use images, songs, magazine articles, social media, videos, poems, comics, games and free exercises to focus on their goals. If they want help with school homework, or to make friends in trips, or to grow professionally, I'll be there. We can talk about anything, like art, movies, books, friends, news, food, sports or journeys.

edu_info.major: Masters by research in Media, Culture and Communication

teacher_info.intro: My name is Emma and I love teaching English online and in the classroom.
teacher_info.about_me: My name is Emma and I love teaching English online and in the classroom.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I love teaching English because it gives me satisfaction to see someone learning a new language which will help them achieve a certain goal in their lives. If it is a child, I love having so much fun with my student while at the same time making sure they learn English.Vocabulary should be taught first, as it is the easiest to grasp because it can be demonstrated with a visual aid. As the student builds vocabulary, the instructor can begin introducing abstract words and elements of the language, but without explaining or focusing on the actual grammatical structure. The complexities of the language will be learned inherently, with the student picking up on its patterns through practice and a
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I use the aural approach for younger students, which involves dialogue. In the beginning, the students will mostly be spoken to. I sometimes use visual cues such as objects to give the students something to associate the words they’re hearing with. Then, they will be instructed to speak the words themselves, coming to grasp vocabulary and basic grammar through hearing and speaking. I do not write the words I am saying, and let the bulk of the instruction exist in dialogue.
For older students I use the English only approach, where I teach vocabulary first using visual aids. As the student builds vocabulary, I introduce abstract words.

teacher_info.short_signature: FULLY QUALIFIED PROFESSIONAL TEACHER|10 YEARS EXPERIENCE
teacher_info.introduction:
Hi! Thanks for looking at my profile!

My name is Andrew, I am a native English speaker from Sheffield in England. I am a TEFL qualified professional English teacher, and have been teaching English, both online and in classrooms since 2013. On italki alone I have successfully taught over 2000 lessons to students from various backgrounds and abilities with different learning requirements.

 For the past 4 years I having been teaching English, first in Taiwan and now in the Philippines, so I understand the challenges of both learning a foreign language, and developing the confidence to use it. My lessons are always personalised to suit your needs! Here is a short explanation of the lessons I offer:

Structured Practical English Lessons. These lessons primarily make use of a slideshow based lesson plan, which helps you to understand various aspects of the English language. If you need help to understand how to accurately use prepositions, articles, tenses, phrasal verbs, idioms and other rules of the English language, this is the course for you!

English Conversation: Do you need to practice and improve your conversation skills? In this class we will do exactly that. I use various audio clips and videos in these lessons to keep them varied and interesting. I will also correct the mistakes you make.

IELTS Speaking and Writing lessons: I have helped many students prepare for IELTS. For these lessons we use a combination of slideshow based information and practice test questions to really work on improving your IELTS scores. Many of my students have improved by 0.5 to 1.0 in IELTS with just a few lessons. Some have even reached scores of 8.5 with a little more work.

Please feel free to ask any questions you many have!


 RESCHEDULING POLICY. If you find out that you can't attend a lesson within 24 hours of the scheduled time, please let me know as soon as possible. If you don't inform me or forget about the lesson, I expect it to be marked 'completed'. Thanks.

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversation
pro_course_detail.description:
One of the most effective ways to improve understanding of a language is to practice speaking it. In my conversation classes you can do exactly that. 

I always aim to have a relaxed atmosphere in conversation classes, to allow you to express yourself freely. At the same time I will correct the mistakes you make. 

What will we talk about?! It's up to you! If you prefer, I can send articles/audio files before a class that can be the basis for conversations, or you can choose a topic that you would like to discuss. 

 In conversation classes we can work to improve your vocabulary, pronunciation, grammar and confidence to have conversations in English.

pro_course_detail.description:

- I can also help you to prepare/edit your CV or other work related documents.

- My background is in the construction industry but my knowledge from this industry is also beneficial to other areas.

pro_course_detail.description:

Lessons can be tailored to your child's specific needs and ability. Please contact me if you have questions or specific goals for your child that you would like to discuss.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Speaking/Writing/Listening/Reading Preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
I have a lot of experience in helping people prepare for IELTS. My lessons primarily focus on the Speaking and Writing parts of the test but I can also help you prepare for Listening and Reading if required. The material I use in this course is made up of a slideshow based lesson plan which has been specifically designed to help you prepare for the IELTS test. 

 Throughout the course we will also practice many current IELTS speaking questions to aid your development of the necessary skills and confidence to excel in the exam.

 Homework would be assigned after each lesson allowing you to complete a current IELTS writing test question which would be marked before the next class.

I have helped over 100 students prepare for the IELTS test, all of whom have made improvements in their English, many have improved their overall scores by 0.5-1.0, some have reached an overall score of 8.5.

pro_course_detail.title: TOEFL/TOEIC Exam Preparation

In this course I will help you prepare for all parts of the exam you plan to take, resources and materials will be provided and the lessons will be tailored to you individual needs.

 After each class, homework for the writing part of the test will be assigned. I will check and correct the homework and we will discuss your written work in each following class.

I've decided to become a tutor on Italki because languages are my life. I've been learning different languages for 4 years, including Portuguese, German, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, Indonesian, French and others. I'd love to save the beautiful Lakota language as well! And now I want to help others learn languages that I'm offering. :)

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a very easy-going person, so don't ever hesitate to ask me anything. I'll gladly answer all of your questions and correct your mistakes, if needed. I love discussing with my students their life goals and passions. I'll adapt to your needs, either it is pronunciation corrections, grammar recap or vocabulary focus. 

I want our lessons to be as natural and relaxed as possible, that's why I love to do some activities with my students, such as learning with movies, songs, or playing games to relax your mind during the lesson.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Usually my lessons are focused on conversation practice, however before diving into our lesson, we will make a study plan where we'll discuss your goals, struggles and weak points. Afterwards, we will focus on achieving everything you need. I will be giving you some pronunciation tips, tricks on how to study and retain vocabulary, correct your grammar (if needed). I'm providing a huge variety of topics (daily routine, slang, idioms, languages, sports, home, food, space and many others), each topic is for a certain level.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice (A1-C2 levels) / Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
This is your chance to improve your Russian speaking! The lesson will be structured according to your needs and level, but the main goal will be set on speaking and enriching your vocabulary. But if there are any grammar questions or anything else, we will discuss them for sure!

I have divided conversation topics according to the levels, but you are free to propose any topic you are interested in (including the ones that are not listed below).

A1-A2
- Animals (Животные)
- Body (Тело)
- Daily Routine (Повседневные дела)
- Family (Семья)
- Food (Еда)
- Hobbies (Хобби)
- Home (Дом)
- Seasons (Времена года)

B1-B2
- Back to school (Назад в школу)
- Books (Книги)
- Clothes (Одежда)
- Emotions (Эмоции)
- Holidays (Праздники) 
- Jobs (Профессии) 
- Movies/TV (Фильмы/Телевизор)
- Music (Музыка)
- Sports (Спорт)

C1-C2
- Space (Космос)
- Internet (Интернет)
- Art (Искусство)
- Idioms (Фразеологизмы)
- Slang (Сленг)
- Unique words (Уникальные слова)

The fastest way of learning any language is by having real-life conversations and that's what we are going to do!

pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson you will try to speak like a real Ukrainian! You may choose whatever topic you would like to discuss with me, just make sure that this topic is not above your level, and we will cover up all vocabulary related to that specific theme. Also we will work on your pronunciation, if needed.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice (A2-B2 levels)
pro_course_detail.description:
I am a native Ukrainian and Russian speaker and I learned English as my 3rd language. Knowing how to speak a language and having the ability to "teach" a language are two absolutely different things. Since I am not a native speaker of English, I have come through a lot of difficulties and I know how hard it can be sometimes. That is why I can help you overcome your struggles. 

The purpose of this lesson is to get you out of your comfort zone and help you actually "speak" the language and furthermore "enjoy" the process. 

You can choose whatever topic you are interested in the most, we will discuss vocabulary and some expressions. If you have any questions related to grammar, you are always free to ask me. But our main goal will be set on speaking and enriching your vocabulary list. 

I can easily adapt to your needs, methods and pace. Also I am very patient with my students. I will repeat and explain things as many times as you want me to, until you fully understand. See you at our lesson!

🍀Please, respect teacher's time, the same as a teacher respects student's time, because a teacher could have had another class at the booked hour. Thanks for your understanding!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners (A0 level)
pro_course_detail.description:
In these lessons you will be able to learn Russian from scratch! We will start our lessons from learning Russian alphabet (if you already know it, we can skip it). Afterwards, we will focus on learning basic grammar topics and study most used words. Together with learning, we will play interactive games (flashcards, guessing the word and others). The lesson depends on your needs and preferences. If you love watching movies/cartoons we will watch them and discuss, if you love reading texts, we will peruse them, if you love music, we will train your listening skills. Also never hesitate to ask me any question, I always answer them gladly!

pro_course_detail.title: Англійська для початківців/Английский для начинающих (для україномовних/и русскоговорящих)
pro_course_detail.description:
Якщо ти завжди хотів/хотіла підтягнути свій "інгліш", але не знав/ла як це зробити, то ці уроки як раз для тебе! Тут ми будемо вчити англійську з самого початку. Почнемо наші заняття з правил читання (якщо ти їх вже знаєш, ми можемо це пропустити). Основний наголос буде на граматику, вправи, нові слова та розмову. Також ми будемо грати в інтерактивні ігри, щоб ліпше запам'ятати слова. 
.
Если ты всегда хотел/а подтянуть свой "инглиш", но все не знал/а как же это сделать, то эти уроки как раз для тебя! Здесь мы будем учить английский с самого начала. Начнем наши занятия с правил чтения (если ты уже это знаешь, мы можем это пропустить). Основной упор будет на грамматику, упражнения, новые слова и разговор. Также мы будем играть в интерактивные игры, чтобы лучше запомнить слова.

pro_course_detail.title: Offline 📝  (flashcards, texts' corrections, personalized vocabulary lists etc)
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you like using flashcards but you have no time adding them to your Anki app (or you are just too lazy to do it?)? Have you written your first Russian text and you have no idea if all sentences there are correct? Do you need someone to record a voice with a clear pronunciation for your flashcards? Here I can help you! 

If you are a BEGINNER, I can help you with learning your first Russian words, I'll make a PERSONALIZED list of the most important words for a beginner and you don't need to break your head over the question "Where should I start from?". I can make them in Anki, in Quizlet or any other app that you'd prefer. 

If you already CAN SPEAK Russian, I can create cards for intermediate or advanced levels or correct any texts you would like. 

You can send me short clips from any movie (with subtitles or without) and I could write down 1) the text; 2) vocabulary/expressions from the video 3) add unique example sentences for each phrase/word. 
You can send me any favorite song of yours and I will help you break down the grammar and each word in it with example sentences and clear explanations. 
With such lessons I want you to SAVE YOUR TIME, so that you could just grab the material and enjoy studying. 

30 min - 50 flashcards 
45 min - 75 flashcards 
60 min - 100 flashcards 
90 min - 150 flashcards 

(If you want me to create 200 flashcards, you can book two 60 min lessons). 

Please keep in mind that these lessons are OFFLINE, that means that we won't video call. I'll spend the booked time on finishing the task that you asked me to do. 

BEFORE BOOKING THIS CLASS please contact me and explain what exactly you want me to do, what app/programme you want me to use and what is the approximate amount of work.

[NOTICE]

🍀Please be aware that booking a lesson is a promise (обещание) between a teacher and a student. 
🍀Rescheduling or cancelling are only available 24 hours before the lesson starts (like it is written in the Italki rules and system). 
🍀O
